snippet: The new data, ahead of the April jobs report, suggests that the economy is in better shape than some experts concluded.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management reports that manufacturing grew in April at the fastest rate in 10 months, suggesting that the economy is healthier than recent data has indicated.
lead_paragraph: The new data, ahead of the April jobs report, suggests that the economy is in better shape than some experts concluded.

headline.seo: Manufacturing Growth Is the Highest in 10 Months
headline.main: Growth in Manufacturing Is Highest in Almost a Year
headline.print_headline: Growth in Manufacturing Is Highest in Almost a Year
